title: Mobile Language Learning Design Strategies Utilizing CMS Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone operation skills and interest in digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Designing language learning environments for in-service professionals using smartphone-based CMS tools. Emphasizes efficient learning tool strategies in limited technological contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can explain how to access weekly learning materials (e.g., lecture outlines, multimedia content) in a timely manner using a CMS tool
Learners can demonstrate the process of collaborating with peer practitioners to complete language tasks using a discussion board feature

Learning efficiency can be improved by over 20% by analyzing the optimal timing for using CMS tools (e.g., assignment submission system, shared resource folders) required for project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
